con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/DocumentSubmission/2_0/NhinService/XDRRequest_Service(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'urn:nhin:Deferred:ProvideAndRegisterDocumentSet-bAcknowledgement' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:nhin:Deferred:ProvideAndRegisterDocumentSet-b" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true"

con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: def dir = context.findProperty('GatewayPropDir'); nhinc.FileUtils.restoreConfiguration(dir, log);

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/DocumentSubmission/2_0/NhinService/XDRResponse_Service (replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'urn:nhin:Deferred:ProvideAndRegisterDocumentSet-bResponseAcknowledgement' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:nhin:Deferred:ProvideAndRegisterDocumentSet-bResponse" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true""

con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: def dir = context.findProperty('GatewayPropDir'); nhinc.FileUtils.restoreConfiguration(dir, log);

con:testCase.name: Document Submission

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/PatientDiscovery/1_0/NhinService/NhinPatientDiscoveryAsyncResp(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'urn:hl7-org:v3:MCCI_IN000002UV01' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:hl7-org:v3:PRPA_IN201306UV02:Deferred:CrossGatewayPatientDiscovery" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true"

con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: def dir = context.findProperty('GatewayPropDir'); nhinc.FileUtils.restoreConfiguration(dir, log);

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/PatientDiscovery/1_0/NhinService/NhinPatientDiscovery (replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'urn:gov:hhs:fha:nhinc:adaptermpi:AdapterMpiSecuredPortType:FindCandidatesSecuredResponse' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'. E) Search the log file for 'urn:gov:hhs:fha:nhinc:adaptercomponentmpi:AdapterComponentMpiSecuredPortType:FindCandidatesSecuredResponse' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:hl7-org:v3:PRPA_IN201305UV02:CrossGatewayPatientDiscovery" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true"

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/DocumentRetrieve/3_0/NhinService/RespondingGateway_Retrieve_Service/DocRetrieve(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'urn:ihe:iti:2007:CrossGatewayRetrieveResponse' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:ihe:iti:2007:CrossGatewayRetrieve" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true"

con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: def dir = context.findProperty('GatewayPropDir'); nhinc.FileUtils.restoreConfiguration(dir, log);

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/DocumentQuery/3_0/NhinService/RespondingGateway_Query_Service/DocQuery(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'urn:ihe:iti:2007:CrossGatewayQueryResponse' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:ihe:iti:2007:CrossGatewayQuery" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag"xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true""

con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: def dir = context.findProperty('GatewayPropDir'); nhinc.FileUtils.restoreConfiguration(dir, log);

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/DocumentSubmission/1_1/NhinService/XDRRequest_Service(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'urn:nhin:Deferred:ProvideAndRegisterDocumentSet-bAcknowledgement' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:ihe:iti:xdr:2007:Deferred:XDRRequestInputMessage" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true""

con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: def dir = context.findProperty('GatewayPropDir'); nhinc.FileUtils.restoreConfiguration(dir, log);

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/DocumentSubmission/1_1/NhinService/XDRResponse_Service(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate as shown soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'urn:nhin:Deferred:ProvideAndRegisterDocumentSet-bResponseAcknowledgement' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:ihe:iti:xdr:2007:Deferred:XDRResponseInputMessage Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true""

con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: def dir = context.findProperty('GatewayPropDir'); nhinc.FileUtils.restoreConfiguration(dir, log);

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/DocumentQuery/2_0/NhinService/RespondingGateway_Query_Service/DocQuery(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'urn:ihe:iti:2007:CrossGatewayQueryResponse' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:ihe:iti:2007:CrossGatewayQuery" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true""

con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: def dir = context.findProperty('GatewayPropDir'); nhinc.FileUtils.restoreConfiguration(dir, log);

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/DocumentRetrieve/2_0/NhinService/RespondingGateway_Retrieve_Service/DocRetrieve(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'urn:ihe:iti:2007:CrossGatewayRetrieveResponse' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true"" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag "urn:ihe:iti:2007:CrossGatewayRetrieve" soap:mustUnderstand="true"

con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: def dir = context.findProperty('GatewayPropDir'); nhinc.FileUtils.restoreConfiguration(dir, log);

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/AdminDistribution/1_0/NhinService/NhinAdminDist(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true"

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:oasis:names:tc:emergency:EDXL:DE:1.0:SendAlertMessage" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true"

con:testCase.name: Document Query - Bad URL
con:testCase.con:description: This test case verifies that the mustUnderstand attribute is returned properly for error messages.

con:config.script: nhinc.FileUtils.updateProperty(context.findProperty('GatewayPropDir'), "gateway.properties", "documentQueryQuerySelf", "false", log); nhinc.FileUtils.createOrUpdateConnection("internalConnectionInfo.xml", context.findProperty('GatewayPropDir'), context.findProperty('LocalHCID'), "adapterdocquerysecured", "http://localhost:8080/Adapter/DocumentQuery/A_0/AdapterDocQuerySecured-BADURL", "LEVEL_a0", log);

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/DocumentQuery/2_0/NhinService/RespondingGateway_Query_Service/DocQuery(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'urn:ihe:iti:2007:CrossGatewayQueryResponse' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:ihe:iti:2007:CrossGatewayQuery" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true""

con:testCase.con:tearDownScript: def dir = context.findProperty('GatewayPropDir'); nhinc.FileUtils.restoreConfiguration(dir, log);

Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/DocumentSubmission/2_0/NhinService/XDRRequest_Service(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate as shown soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate as shown soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'urn:nhin:Deferred:ProvideAndRegisterDocumentSet-bAcknowledgement' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/DocumentSubmission/2_0/DocumentRepositoryXDR_Service (replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'urn:ihe:iti:2007:ProvideAndRegisterDocumentSet-bResponse' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:ihe:iti:2007:ProvideAndRegisterDocumentSet-b" Result should display the following within ReplyTotag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true"

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/PatientDiscovery/1_0/NhinService/NhinPatientDiscovery (replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'urn:gov:hhs:fha:nhinc:adaptermpi:AdapterMpiSecuredPortType:FindCandidatesSecuredResponse' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'. E) Search the log file for 'urn:gov:hhs:fha:nhinc:adaptercomponentmpi:AdapterComponentMpiSecuredPortType:FindCandidatesSecuredResponse' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:hl7-org:v3:PRPA_IN201305UV02:CrossGatewayPatientDiscovery" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true"

con:testCase.name: Document Query

con:config.script: nhinc.FileUtils.updateProperty(context.findProperty('GatewayPropDir'), "gateway.properties", "documentQueryQuerySelf", "false", log);

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/AdminDistribution/2_0/NhinService/NhinAdminDist(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true"

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:oasis:names:tc:emergency:EDXL:DE:1.0:SendAlertMessage" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true""

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/DocumentSubmission/1_1/NhinService/XDRRequest_Service(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true"> D) Search the log file for 'urn:nhin:Deferred:ProvideAndRegisterDocumentSet-bAcknowledgement' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/DocumentSubmission/1_1/DocumentRepositoryXDR_Service(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'urn:ihe:iti:2007:ProvideAndRegisterDocumentSet-bResponse' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:ihe:iti:xdr:2007:ProvideAndRegisterDocumentSet-b" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag"xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true"

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/PatientDiscovery/1_0/NhinService/NhinPatientDiscovery(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'urn:gov:hhs:fha:nhinc:adaptermpi:AdapterMpiSecuredPortType:FindCandidatesSecuredResponse' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'. E) Search the log file for 'urn:gov:hhs:fha:nhinc:adaptercomponentmpi:AdapterComponentMpiSecuredPortType:FindCandidatesSecuredResponse' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:hl7-org:v3:PRPA_IN201305UV02:CrossGatewayPatientDiscovery" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true"

con:testCase.name: Document Query

con:config.script: nhinc.FileUtils.updateProperty(context.findProperty('GatewayPropDir'), "gateway.properties", "documentQueryQuerySelf", "false", log);

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/AdminDistribution/1_0/NhinService/NhinAdminDist(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true"

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true">urn:oasis:names:tc:emergency:EDXL:DE:1.0:SendAlertMessage" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true"

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep - Verify logs
con:testStep.con:description: Verify WSA-Action and ReplyTo within SOAP Header in Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/CORE_X12DocumentSubmission/1_0/GenericBatchResponseTransaction_Service(replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-Action should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" c) Look for Soap Header and within Soap Header WSA-ReplyTo should populate soap:mustUnderstand="true" D) Search the log file for 'http://www.caqh.org/SOAP/WSDL/CORETransactions/BatchSubmitTransactionResponse' and verify that it is preceded by 'soap:mustUnderstand="true"'.

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following within Action tag "xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing" soap:mustUnderstand="true" Result should display the following within ReplyTo tag "urn:ihe:iti:2007:CrossGatewayRetrieve" soap:mustUnderstand="true"
